```{r filter for kidney celltype genesets}
C8 = msigdbr(species = "Homo sapiens", category = "C8")

DESCARTES_FETAL_KIDNEY_ERYTHROBLASTS =C8[C8$gs_id=="M40219",]
DESCARTES_FETAL_KIDNEY_LYMPHOID_CELLS=C8[C8$gs_id=="M40226",]
```
